title: On the Expressive Power of Deep Learning: A Tensor Analysis
authors: N Cohen, O Sharir, A Shashua - arXiv preprint arXiv:1509.05009
excerpt: Abstract: It has long been conjectured that hypothesis spaces suitable for data that is compositional in nature, such as text or images, may be more efficiently represented with deep hierarchical architectures than with shallow ones. Despite the vast empirical  ...
